thread.section_title: Oil News | Gas News - Yahoo! Finance UK
thread.title: Friday broker round-up

title: Friday broker round-up
text:
166.10 +2.1000 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Aberdeen Asset Management (Other OTC: ABDNF - news ) : JP Morgan Cazenove reiterates neutral stance and trims target to 415p from 435p. SocGen (Paris: FR0000130809 - news ) stays at hold but lowers target to 410p from 485p. Jefferies keeps at hold with 405p target, down from 460p. Aggreko : Investec (LSE: INVP.L - news ) keeps at sell. 
AG Barr : Investec reiterates buy. Shore Capital stays at hold. N+1 Singer keeps at sell. 
Beazley : Numis reiterates add with 350p target. Shore Capital reiterates buy. 
Cairn Energy (LSE: CNE.L - news ) : SocGen upgrades hold with 180p target versus 165p before. 
Centrica : Goldman Sachs (NYSE: GS-PB - news ) reiterates buy with 322p target. 
Daily Mail and General Trust : Nomura reiterates neutral and assigns 865p target, down from 930p. Investec stays at buy with 954p target. Barclays (LSE: BARC.L - news ) lowers target to 970p from 1,065p yet reiterates overweight. 
Dairy Crest (LSE: DCG.L - news ) : UBS (NYSEArca: FBGX - news ) lowers target to 515p from 545p and take the stock down a peg to neutral. 
Flybe : HSBC ups target to 70p from 60p but downgrades to reduce. 
Howden Joinery : JP Morgan Cazenove reiterates overweight, lifts target to 560p from 520p.
